original_title: The Jeff Healey Band - Live in Belgium
overview: Recorded on July 18, 1993 at Peer Blues Festival in Peer, Belgium whilst touring  in support of the "Feel This" album. The band normally performed as a trio however for this show they add a keyboardist and two backing vocalists giving the songs greater depth and range taking the entire performance to a new level. The Jeff Healey Band were legendary live performers , this captures them at their very best.
title: The Jeff Healey Band: Live in Belgium
